attribute.description: DMI inband BAR enable. Set by platform. Used by p9c_set_inband_addr.

OMI inband BAR address offset.
Set by platform.
One Axone bar register is set per MC channel for MMIO and another is set per MC channel for config space. The bar is shared between both sub-channels each with an OCMB. The upper bit of the bar size is used to determine which sub-channel is selected. This means that for two OCMB's their config space is contiguous and their MMIO space is contiguous. Therefore a single OCMB's MMIO and config space cannot be contiguous. However, we can still use one BAR attribute. The p9a_omi_setup_bars procedure can interleave the config space and MMIO space as shown in the table bellow. For example, both MMIO and config bar sizes are 2GB. The 2GB bit becomes the selector for the subchannel. The 4GB bit becomes the offset applied for MMIO operations.
